name: Kenneth & Parasite
description:
Kenneth is controlled by a Parasite that's as weak as 1 hp and shoots a lot of crows, how many can he shoot before he DIES?

Kenneth & Parasite was created by thealmightyco. (taco.) and Two Guys in One of Team Bunsun

Controls:

W = move arm UP

S = move are DOWN

Mouse button to SHOOT

Coding/Programming: taco. and Two Guys in One

Art: taco. and Two Guys in One

Sound: Two Guys in One

Made in Unity
